channel.title: Pycon on PyCon Pune Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Pycon on PyCon Pune Blog

item.title: The Registration for the PyCon Pune 2018 is now open.
item.description: PyCon Pune, the conference that started its journey in 2017, has opened up the registrations for the 2018 version now. You have the following ticket options for the conference which you can purchase from the registration page in our website: The Conference Ticket for ₹1700 grants you access to the main conference, 8th & 9th of February 2018. This ticket also includes a t-shirt of your preferred size. The Conference & Developer Sprints Ticket come at a price of ₹2500.
